description: This file contains unit tests for the OpenWeatherTools class, testing various functionalities including initialization, weather data retrieval, air pollution data, error handling, and parameter passing.

classes.name: OpenWeatherTools
classes.description: The class being tested, which provides methods to interact with the OpenWeather API.

methods.name: get_current_weather
methods.description: Retrieves current weather data for a specified location.

methods.name: get_forecast
methods.description: Retrieves weather forecast data for a specified location.

methods.name: get_air_pollution
methods.description: Retrieves air pollution data for a specified location.

methods.name: geocode_location
methods.description: Converts a location name into geographic coordinates.
